ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( OR($RecordType.Name = 'HRS 401(k) Opportunity Record Type',$RecordType.Name = 'HRS 401(k) Opportunity FSS Record Type'), Probability >=0.80, ISPICKVAL(Did_a_FA_Refer_this_Plan__c, ''))
&& NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Admin')) && NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'Paychex Marketing Admin'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Complete the Did a FA Refer this Plan field
